News.Title: Owais Metal And Mineral Completes First Commercial Sale of Tantalum Pentoxide
News.Summary: Owais Metal And Mineral achieved its first commercial sale of Tantalum Pentoxide (Ta2O5), marking the company's entry into the rare earth supply chain. This milestone represents the company's initial revenue generation from rare earth materials.

News.Title: Owais Metal and Mineral Processing: SME Stock Soars 1,245% Since IPO
News.Summary: Owais Metal and Mineral Processing shares have surged 1,245% since its IPO in March, rising from ₹87 to ₹1,170. An initial investment of ₹1.39 lakh is now worth ₹18.7 lakh. The company, with a market cap of ₹2,127.34 crore, specializes in metal and minerals mining and processing.
